page.title: 11Jobs in Dovercourt- at sea
page.content: Dovercourt is by the sea and next to this holiday town are the docks of Parkeston and Harwich. These docks and the Port of Harwich generate many jobs for those living in Dovercourt. Some jobs are mainly based at sea, while others are at the docks themselves. Harwich and Parkeston are kept busy by a constant flow of continental ferries to and from Denmark and Holland. Many men work on these boats as crew. Some help to run the coffee shop and duty free shop. Others are engineers. These men are often at sea for several weeks at a time. When the boats arrive many of the women from the area go on board to clean. Some men are employed by Trinity House to act as pilots. They help boats enter and leave port safely.
